channel.title: EventProduction on Science Slam Zürich
channel.description: Recent content in EventProduction on Science Slam Zürich

item.title: Benjamin Schneider
item.description: Benjamin joined Science Slam Zurich back in 2016 while working in software engineering in the events industry out of a passion for organizing events and learning about new topics. Currently studying Computer Science and Economics in Zurich, he takes care of all online activities and helps producing our events.
